title: MD
biography: Zeng Yixin is a Chinese oncologist and politician, and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
aiSummary: Zeng Yixin is a oncology specialist with an H-index of 74 at National Health Commission (Member). Has been published in Cancer Cell, Nature Genetics, Nature Microbiology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
